nodes.text: Zov was a Human male sergeant in the Galactic Republic's army who served during the Galactic War between the Sith Empire and the Republic. Following the Battle of Corellia, Zov was among the Republic forces that remained on the planet Corellia to secure the Black Hole refinery region, and was stationed at Sentinel Outpost.

Sergeant Zov appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Classic Gear Vendor for the Republic faction in the Black Hole Daily Area, which was added in Game Update 1.2: Legacy on April 12, 2012.
